message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $2000000 is significantly above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1200000 for this product.  Let me know if you're open to discussing this.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1200000 is a significant discount from my initial offer, but I'm still looking to get a better price for this unique product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1800000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $1800000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $1400000.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

Bob, I understand that you're willing to go up to $1400000, but I'm still looking to get a better price for this unique product. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1600000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
